sqlMap.insert: insert into app_user (id, first_name, last_name) values (#id#, #firstName#, #lastName#);
sqlMap.update: update app_user set first_name = #firstName#, last_name = #lastName# where id = #id#;
sqlMap.select: select id, first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName from app_user where id=#id#;
select id, first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName from app_user;
